item.title: BERT: Pre-training of Deep Bidirectional Transformers for Language Understanding
item.description: 論文引用: Devlin, J., Chang, M., Lee, K., & Toutanova, K. (2019). BERT: Pre-training of Deep Bidirectional Transformers for Language Understanding. North American Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics.
